parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time. The maximum time range is 31 days.

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description:
The type of the DDoS attack event to be queried. Valid values:

 *   **web-cc**: resource exhaustion attacks
 *   **cc**: connection flood attacks
 *   **traffic**: volumetric attacks

If you do not configure this parameter, DDoS attack events of all types are queried.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: 1. Value range: 1 to 10,000.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**. Valid values: 5, 10, and 20.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
